articles.description: Who will become the first person into top five? We lift off the cloche...
articles.content: For today's immunity challenge, the MasterChef kitchen has become a cloche showroom, as rows of cloche-topped pedestals line the floor. "Oh my cloche!" says Reynold, which should be the working title… [+10829 chars]

articles.title: Why actor Marta Dusseldorp says the arts are vital for our coronavirus recovery - ABC News
articles.description: When arts power couple Marta Dusseldorp and Ben Winspear started Archipelago Productions last year, a global pandemic was not among the potential hurdles they considered.
articles.content:
